page.title: 04Litter In TONYREFAIL
page.content: We carried out a{litter survey}of Tonyrefail asking shopkeepers for their opinion of the litter problem. When we had sorted out what we had learnt from our survey ,this is what we gathered. They all felt that Tonyrefail was a place that they were dissatisfied with,but did little about it themselves.We all asked different questions and that made it difficult to generalize.We went into a pet shop and a video shop.We asked,"Who do you think causes the litter problem?" The answer was "The public".No shop said that their shop caused litter.They could easily put signs up saying NO LITTER.The pet shop lady has never told any children off for dropping litter,which I think she should have done.
